vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωσή, see: Ἰωσῆς - -ῆ (Rec. -ή Luk.3:29; AV, Jose; see: Ἰησοῦς, 3), and -ῆτος (Mk, ll with), ὁ,
Joses;
__1. brother of our Lord: Mrk.6:3, Mat.13:55 (Rec., see: Ἰωσήφ).
__2. Son of Mary: Mat.27:56 (-σήφ), WH, txt), Mrk.15:40, 47
__3. see: Βαρνάβας.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.29;
son of: Eliezer (G1663);
father of: Er (G2262)
§ - Jose, an Israelite
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約細 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "他將是耶和華所援護的"
以利以謝的兒子,耶穌基督的家譜 (路 3:29)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约细 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "他将是耶和华所援护的"
以利以谢的儿子,耶稣基督的家谱 (路 3:29)
